response.overview: A story of the challenges of a deaf mother, Mariana raising her hearing child, Nelly that interweaves with the life of a domestic helper, Asih who is a motherly figure to Nelly as well. She works with the family for more than ten years and Mariana’s jealousy of Asih has grown during Nelly’s teenage years as Nelly shows more affection towards Asih. Meanwhile, Asih’s son has liver failure and Asih strives to provide the best she can for his recovery. After years of accumulated anger and jealousy, Mariana terminated Asih. Nelly gets upset with her mother and their relationship drifts further apart. Is Mariana able to mend her relationship with Nelly before she lose Nelly for good?
response.title: Mamaku Bibikku
